Passengers
{{flight}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flight', templateUrl: './search-flight.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flight.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: any = [ "American Airlains", "British Airways", "Georgian Airways", "Turkish Airlines" ] constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
